analyzed: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsis kyi man ngag ces bya ba /

analyzed: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: stong pa rab skyes nas bzung ste //
analyzed: stong pa rab skyes nas bzung ste //
translated: From the beginning of the empty [fortnight],

analyzed: 'das lo byin pas lo dag pa'o //
translated: the elapsed years are the purified years.

original: nyi mas bsgyur bas zla bar 'gyur //
analyzed: nyi mas bsgyur bas zla bar 'gyur //

original: dgun zla 'bring sogs 'das zla sbyin //
analyzed: dgun zla 'bring sogs 'das zla sbyin //

original: gnas gnyis @281b 'og ma mig gis bsgyur //
analyzed: gnas gnyis @281b 'og ma mig gis bsgyur //

original: mda' ros thob la gcig bsres te //
analyzed: mda' ros thob la gcig bsres te //

original: steng la byin pas zla dag 'gyur //
analyzed: steng la byin pas zla dag 'gyur //
translated: The purified months are obtained by adding above.

original: zla dag gnas gsum bar ma la //
analyzed: zla dag gnas gsum bar ma la //
translated: The purified months, in the three places, the middle,

original: so yis bsgyur te mig gis bsre //
analyzed: so yis bsgyur te mig gis bsre //

original: 'og la ros thob par ma sbyang //
analyzed: 'og la ros thob par ma sbyang //

analyzed: lhag la mkha' sbyin bar nas gcig /'og tu phab la drug cus bsgyur //
translated: In the remainder, the sky-given is subtracted from the middle, and brought below, and multiplied by sixty.

original: mkha' byin des phri lhag chu srang //
analyzed: mkha' byin des phri lhag chu srang //

original: bar ma drug cus bgos thob rnams //
analyzed: bar ma drug cus bgos thob rnams //

original: steng byin lhag mchu tshod gnas //
analyzed: steng byin lhag mchu tshod gnas //

original: de la ris bgos lhag gza' gnas //
analyzed: de la ris bgos lhag gza' gnas //

original: gnas gnyis 'og mar klu mig sbyin //
analyzed: gnas gnyis 'og mar klu mig sbyin //
translated: In the two places below, the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s are given.

original: dus gnyis bgos lhag cha shas gnas //
analyzed: dus gnyis bgos lhag cha shas gnas //
translated: In the two times, the division is the remainder.

original: nor la ri dang zla ba sres te //
analyzed: nor la ri dang zla ba sres te //
translated: Wealth is multiplied by the mountain and the moon.üîΩThe upper [part] is entered by the hand.

original: steng ma lag pas bsgyur la gzhug / klu lag bgos lhag ril po'i gnas //
analyzed: steng ma lag pas bsgyur la gzhug / klu lag bgos lhag ril po'i gnas //

original: zla ba dag par gdengs ka sbyin //
analyzed: zla ba dag par gdengs ka sbyin //

analyzed: gnas gsum bar ma drag pos bsgyur // 'o ga ma bu ga yon tan gyis //
translated: In the three places, the middle is changed by the strong one.

original: thob pas bar sbyang lhag mal //
analyzed: thob pas bar sbyang lhag mal //
translated: The upper and lower openings are obtained by the qualities.üîΩThe remainder is purified by the middle.üîΩThe remainder is obtained by changing the space and time.

original: mkha' dus bsgyur te thob pa dang // lhag ma drug gis bsgyur te thob //
analyzed: mkha' dus bsgyur te thob pa dang // lhag ma drug gis bsgyur te thob //

original: bar nas 'og phab rim sbyangs pa'i //
analyzed: bar nas 'og phab rim sbyangs pa'i //
translated: The remainder is brought down from the middle.

original: lhag mchu srang dbugs su gnas //
analyzed: lhag mchu srang dbugs su gnas //
translated: The remainder is in the mouth, the scales, and the breath.

original: dbus ma drug cus bgos pa'i lhag / chu tshod yin te thob pa la //
analyzed: dbus ma drug cus bgos pa'i lhag / chu tshod yin te thob pa la //
translated: The remainder of the division by sixty of the middle is the gha·π≠ikƒÅ.üîΩThe remainder is entered by adding one to the upper remainder.

analyzed: gcig bsres steng ma lhag bsgyur gzhug / de ltar bgos lhag skar ma'i gnas // gza' la tshes sbyin dbyu gur dbri //

original: ril por sbyin te chu zla yis //
analyzed: ril por sbyin te chu zla yis //
translated: The remainder is given in its entirety. By the moon of the water,

original: bgos pa'i lhag mas rkang pa gzung //
analyzed: bgos pa'i lhag mas rkang pa gzung //

original: bgor med na ni de nyid gzung //
analyzed: bgor med na ni de nyid gzung //

original: thob pa mnyam sbyin mi mnyam dor //
analyzed: thob pa mnyam sbyin mi mnyam dor //

original: 'byung dang 'byung dang mda' rig byed //
analyzed: 'byung dang 'byung dang mda' rig byed //

original: me dang mig dang zla ba ste //
analyzed: me dang mig dang zla ba ste //

analyzed: phyi ma la ni de nyid bzlog / zla ba'i rkang bar shes par bya //

original: rkang pa ma zin dang pos bsgyur //
analyzed: rkang pa ma zin dang pos bsgyur //

original: de la dus dang nyi ma yis //
analyzed: de la dus dang nyi ma yis //

analyzed: bgos pas thob pa chu tshod yin //

original: lhag ma drug cus bsgyur ba la //
analyzed: lhag ma drug cus bsgyur ba la //

analyzed: 'og gi sum cha steng la sbyin //

analyzed: lhag @282a * //

analyzed: bgos pas thob pa chu tshod yin //
